Meet Photo X

We're a creative team passionate about capturing life's most beautiful moments through the art of photography.

Our Story

Founded in 2018, Photo X began as a small studio with a big dream. We wanted to create more than just photographs - we wanted to capture the essence of every moment, the emotion behind every smile, and the story within every frame.

Today, we're proud to be one of Los Angeles' most trusted photography studios, having captured over 500 weddings, countless portraits, and numerous commercial projects.

7
Years of Excellence
Since 2018

Award Winner

Los Angeles Photography Excellence Award 2023

12+

Team Members

Talented photographers and creative professionals

Premium Equipment

Sony Alpha cameras, professional lenses, and lighting

500+

Projects Completed

Weddings, portraits, events, and commercial work

Our Philosophy

"Every photograph should tell a story that resonates for generations."

We believe in capturing authentic moments, genuine emotions, and timeless beauty. Our approach combines technical expertise with artistic vision to create images that you'll treasure forever.

Photo X

We are storytellers, artists, and craftsmen dedicated to capturing the essence of your most precious moments.

Discover Our Story

Our Story

The Beginning

Photo X was born from a simple belief: that every moment has a story worth telling. Founded in 2018 by Sarah Johnson, our studio began as a small creative space where passion met purpose.

What started as a solo endeavor quickly grew into a collaborative team of artists, each bringing their unique perspective to the craft of photography.

Growth & Evolution

As our reputation grew, so did our team. We carefully selected photographers who shared our vision and commitment to excellence. Each member brings their own specialty, creating a diverse and talented collective.

Today, we're proud to have captured over 500 weddings and countless portraits, each one a testament to our dedication to storytelling through photography.

Our Mission

We believe that photography is more than just capturing imagesâ€”it's about preserving emotions, relationships, and the fleeting moments that make life beautiful.

Our mission is to create photographs that not only document your story but also evoke the same emotions years from now as they did the day they were taken.

What We Stand For

Excellence

We never settle for good enough. Every photograph we deliver meets our highest standards of quality and artistry.

Authenticity

We capture genuine moments and real emotions, creating images that tell your true story with honesty and heart.

Trust

We build lasting relationships with our clients based on reliability, transparency, and mutual respect.

Meet Our Team

Behind every great photograph is a passionate artist. Meet the talented individuals who make the magic happen.

Sarah Johnson

Founder & Lead Photographer

Sarah's artistic vision and technical expertise have been the foundation of Photo X for over 7 years.

Michael Chen

Senior Photographer

Michael specializes in wedding photography and has a gift for capturing the most intimate moments.

Emily Rodriguez

Portrait Specialist

Emily's warm personality and creative eye make her exceptional at portrait and family photography.
